pageProps.content:
Experience

Ideally located on Mombasa Avenue, Eka Hotel provides an ideal base from which to explore the vibrant city of Nairobi & has easy access to Jomo Kenyatta & Wilson Airports.
Eka Hotel offers contemporary accommodation, two on-site restaurants, a swimming pool & fitness centre as well as babysitting services, laundry & shuttle transfers.

Stay

Accommodation comprises superior rooms, junior suites & executive suites, all featuring open-plan en-suite bathrooms.
The junior suites also have sitting areas & executive rooms have sitting & working areas.
Communal areas include 2 restaurants, a bar, gym, pool & wellness spa where relaxing treatments can be enjoyed.

Activities

Apart from enjoying all the on-site facilities, Eka Hotel guests can also book day trips to the nearby Giraffe Centre & the Nairobi National Museum.

Eka Hotel offers contemporary accommodation, two on-site restaurants, a swimming pool & fitness centre as well as babysitting services, laundry & shuttle transfers.

subfolders.title: Hemingways Nairobi
subfolders.description: Hemingways Nairobi is set within the tranquil & upscale neighbourhood of Karen & offers luxurious suites & exceptional service. Overlooking the Ngong Hills in Nairobi, this boutique hotel is the ideal stop-over for pre or post-safari stays.  With nearby attractions like the Nairobi National Park or top restaurants like The Talisman, guests will be able to experience Kenya’s capital in style.

subfolders.title: Nairobi Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Nairobi Tented Camp enjoys an ideal setting within the Nairobi National Park – an authentic big game reserve on the outskirts of the city.   Tucked away in a riverine forest, this charming, tented camp is a great introduction to a Kenya safari.

subfolders.title: Ololo Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Nairobi National Park is the only park in the world that borders a capital city & on its border lies Ololo Safari Lodge, a classic safari haven set in 20 acres of lush gardens. Its ideal setting within 45 minutes from Jomo Kenyatta International Airport & its convenient access through the park makes this an ideal choice for travellers who would like to start their safari on the first day they arrive in Kenya.

subfolders.title: The Emakoko
subfolders.description: The Emakoko, an owner-managed boutique hotel, boasts a spectacular location on the border of Nairobi National Park & is only a 45-minute drive from Jomo Kenyatta Airport. It is hard to believe that only a few minutes from the city’s hustle & bustle you can find an authentic safari lodge that offers thrilling game drives & encounters with endangered animals.

subfolders.title: The Giraffe Manor
subfolders.description: Offering an experience like no other, the charming Giraffe Manor is set within 140 acres of indigenous forest in Karen, an upscale neighbourhood in Nairobi. Yes, that photo you have seen so many times on Instagram where guests are hand-feeding a giraffe that is peeking its head through a window – happens here daily.
